## What the New Splash Screen Does:
1. ✅ **Requests Location Permission** - For auto-filling address 2. ✅ **Requests Photo/Gallery Permission** - For uploading restaurant logo 3. ✅ **Shows Permission Status** - Displays what permissions were granted 4. ✅ **Waits 2 Seconds** - Gives user time to see the status 5. ✅ **Smart Navigation** - Redirects to appropriate screen based on auth status
## Permission Flows:
**On First Launch:** ``` Splash Screen → Request Permissions → Show Status → Wait 2s → Navigate ```
**Subsequent Launches:** ``` Splash Screen → Permissions Already Granted → Navigate Immediately UISupportedInterfaceOrientations
